name: Calm Meditation App
description: Free Calm access for qualifying library patrons with guided meditations, courses, stories, music, and stress management tools via web and mobile app
fullDescription: San Mateo County Library provides free access to the Calm app, offering guided meditations, sleep stories, and stress management tools.
whatTheyOffer:
- Full access to Calm premium features
- Guided meditations
- Sleep stories
- Relaxing music
- Breathing exercises
- Stress management courses
howToGetIt:
1. Have a San Mateo County Library card
2. Visit smcl.org/get-calm
3. Follow instructions to create or link Calm account
4. Access Calm via web browser or mobile app
5. Enjoy unlimited access while program continues
keywords: Calm, meditation, sleep stories, stress management, relaxation, breathing exercises, mindfulness, mental health, San Mateo Library
